comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: B-25D serial 41-30024 "Pannell Job" of the 500th Bomb Squadron, 345th BG. Assigned to 1LT Ray Pannell, he was killed on a training mission in this aircraft on 11 June 1944, along with two other crewmembers.

comment.author: 92786712@N08
comment._content: My father, Lorin Jones, was the crew chief on Pannell Job. He's still alive at 92 and has told me of the day it went down.
